components.name: Frontend
components.description: User-facing interface for inputting and viewing cost data.

components.name: Backend API
components.description: Handles business logic and communication between frontend, database, and cost service.

components.name: Cost Calculation Service
components.description: Processes cost data and performs calculations for threat modeling.

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores cost data, user inputs, and threat model results.

data_flows.description: User inputs are sent to the backend for processing.
Processed data is stored in the database for persistence.
Raw data is forwarded to the cost service for analysis.
Calculated results are saved to the database.

trust_boundaries.name: Public Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Frontend interface accessible over the internet with minimal trust.

trust_boundaries.name: Internal Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Secure network containing backend, database, and cost service with strict access controls.
